title: Interstellar
cast: Matthew McConaughey, Anne Hathaway, Jessica Chastain, Michael Caine
description: A team of explorers travels through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

title: Inception
cast: Leonardo DiCaprio, Joseph Gordon-Levitt, Ellen Page, Tom Hardy
description: In this mind-bending sci-fi thriller, a man with the ability to enter people's dreams is tasked with planting an idea in someone's mind.

title: Avengers: Endgame
cast: Robert Downey Jr., Chris Evans, Mark Ruffalo, Chris Hemsworth
description: After the devastating events of Avengers: Infinity War, the universe is in ruins. With the help of remaining allies, the Avengers assemble once more in order to reverse Thanos' actions and restore balance to the universe.

title: Joker
cast: Joaquin Phoenix, Robert De Niro, Zazie Beetz, Frances Conroy
description: In Gotham City, mentally troubled comedian Arthur Fleck is disregarded and mistreated by society. He then embarks on a downward spiral of revolution and bloody crime.

cast: George MacKay, Dean-Charles Chapman, Mark Strong, Andrew Scott
description: During World War I, two British soldiers are tasked with delivering a life-saving message across enemy lines to prevent a deadly ambush.

title: TENET
cast: John David Washington, Robert Pattinson, Elizabeth Debicki, Dimple Kapadia
description: Armed with only one word, Tenet, and fighting for the survival of the entire world, a protagonist journeys through a twilight world of international espionage on a mission that will unfold in something beyond real-time.

title: Star Wars: A New Hope
cast: Mark Hamill, Harrison Ford, Carrie Fisher, Peter Cushing
listed_in: Action & Adventure, Children & Family Movies, Classic Movies, Sci-Fi & Fantasy
description: Obi-Wan Kenobi guides intrepid Luke Skywalker on a valiant bid to save Princess Leia from Darth Vader in a classic battle between good and evil.

title: Venom
cast: Tom Hardy, Michelle Williams, Riz Ahmed, Scott Haze
description: A failed reporter is bonded to an alien entity, one of many symbiotes who have invaded Earth. But the being takes a liking to Earth and decides to protect it.

title: The Dark Knight
cast: Christian Bale, Heath Ledger, Aaron Eckhart, Michael Caine
description: In this thrilling sequel, Batman teams up with Commissioner Gordon and the new District Attorney to take on a psychotic mastermind known as the Joker.

title: The Matrix
cast: Keanu Reeves, Laurence Fishburne, Carrie-Anne Moss, Hugo Weaving
description: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against the controllers of it.
